text: Lemmings 3D released in Japan and PAL regions as 3D Lemmings is a puzzle video game developed by Clockwork Games and published by Psygnosis Limited for DOS and Saturn and also published by Sony Computer Entertainment for the PlayStation home console. The gameplay is similiar to Lemmings original game, requires player to lead all the lemmings to their exit by giving them the appropriate "skills". It was the first installment of Lemmings series in 3D. Category:1995 video games Category:DOS games Category:PlayStation games Category:Puzzle video games Category:Sega Saturn games
title: Lemmings 3D
